entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
